level.heading: Transfers from the Office of Local Business Development to the Department of Small and Local Business Development.
level.text: All positions, personnel, property, records, and unexpended balances of appropriations, allocations, and other funds available or to be made available to the Office of Local Business Development established by § 2-1205.01 [repealed], are hereby transferred to the Department.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 16-191, in the credit, renumbered the section designation from § 2315 to § 2314.
